name: ai-accessibility-testing
description: Professional automated accessibility testing solution with comprehensive WCAG 2.1 AA compliance reports. Features interactive CLI, multi-tool analysis (axe-core + Pa11y + visual), and audience-specific reporting for stakeholders, researchers, and developers.
author: Brad Reaney

scripts.audit:parallel: npm run audit:pre-crawl && node --max-old-space-size=4096 --expose-gc ./node_modules/.bin/playwright test --project=chromium --grep '@axe-core|@pa11y|@visual' --workers=4 && node --max-old-space-size=4096 --expose-gc ./node_modules/.bin/playwright test --project=chromium --grep '@reporting'
scripts.audit:fresh: npm run clean:all && npm run audit:parallel
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:reports && npm run clean:cache && npm run clean:analysis
scripts.clean:browsers: echo 'Browser cleanup now handled by Playwright automatically'
scripts.system:cleanup: npm run clean:browsers && npm run clean:all
scripts.system:status: ps aux | grep -E '(chrome|chromium|playwright|node)' | grep -v grep || echo 'No processes found'
scripts.code:check: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run format:check
scripts.code:fix: npm run typecheck && npm run lint:fix && npm run format
